mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_table(create_time, client_id, order_sale_price, order_purchase_price, state, wholesale_order) VALUES(#{create_id}, #{client_id}, #{order_sale_price}, #{order_purchase_price}, #{state}, #{wholesale_order})
INSERT INTO order_prod_table(order_id, product_id, count) VALUES(#{order_id}, #{product_id}, #{count})
mapper.select: SELECT order_id, client_id, order_sale_price, order_purchase_price FROM order_table WHERE state = "draft"
mapper.delete: DELETE order_table,order_prod_table FROM order_table AS o1 LEFT JOIN order_prod_table AS o2 on o1.order_id = o2.order_id WHERE order_table.state = "draft"
mapper.select: SELECT client_id, client_name, sex, phone, address, points FROM client_table WHERE wholesale_client = 1
SELECT product_id, product_name, type, unit, purchase_price, wholesale_price FROM product_table
SELECT order_id, create_name, client_id, order_sale_price, order_purchase_price FROM order_table WHERE state = "approved"
SELECT order_id, create_name, pay_time, client_id, order_sale_price, order_purchase_price FROM order_table WHERE state = "paid" and wholesale_order = 1
SELECT order_id, create_name, pay_time, return_time, client_id, order_sale_price, order_purchase_price, order_profit, state, wholesale_order FROM order_table
